Daily Sync System — Installer

This application automates the synchronization of daily JSON and image files from a server
and generates structured summary reports.

Features:
 • Auto background syncing
 • Smart shift event detection (IN/OUT)
 • Daily report generation in DOCX format
 • Desktop notifications for shift changes
 • Minimize to tray support
 • Light / Dark UI themes

Installation Notes:
 • Windows 10 or later is recommended
 • Requires an active internet connection for syncing
 • Reports directory must be configured in the application after installation
